# CogBioAV Lab - Project Instructions

This is a Next.js project with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS for CogBioAV Lab.

## Project Type
Next.js with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS

## Purpose
Portfolio website for Md Mahbub E Noor, Assistant Professor, Department of CSE, University of Barisal

## Design Reference
Based on https://www.mlhossen.net/

## Progress
- [x] Created copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold Next.js project
- [x] Customize project
- [x] Install dependencies
- [x] Launch development server
